hero.subheading: PolyBull unifies institutional data, AI signals, and human context so modern desks can see every rotation before it hits the tape.

features.title: Institutional-grade intelligence
features.subtitle: Everything you need to interrogate equities in one terminal.

items.title: Predictive Signals
items.description: Proprietary ML surfaces unusual flow, liquidity vacuums, and lead-lag anomalies.

items.title: Scenario Lab
items.description: Stress portfolios against macro regimes, rate paths, and sector rotations in seconds.

items.title: Risk Radar
items.description: Live factor exposures, crowding scores, and downside breakpoints for every ticker.

items.title: Automation Stack
items.description: Route alerts to Slack, Symphony, or OMS when PolyBull spots asymmetric risk.

live.title: Live intel stream
live.insightBody: Financials factor reversing as energy bid accelerates. Watch regional banks for catch-up and fade extended semi strength.
live.manualBody: Desk notes rotation out of megacap tech into cyclicals after CPI surprise. Monitoring liquidity pockets in airlines and homebuilders.

events.title: Options sweep
events.description: NVDA 0DTE call wall triggered at $140 strike.

events.title: Dark pool print
events.description: $38M block in LLY executes 12 bps above NBBO.

events.title: Rebalance pulse
events.description: CTAs adding $1.1B exposure to S&P futures into close.

markets.title: Global market coverage
markets.subtitle: PolyBull ingests equity, ETF, and futures data across every major venue.

faq.title: Questions, answered
faq.subtitle: Everything teams ask before moving to PolyBull.

items.question: Where does PolyBull source data?
items.answer: We stream equities, options, and macro feeds from top-tier venues plus proprietary sentiment pipelines.

items.question: Do you replace the analyst desk?
items.answer: PolyBull augments humans with faster context. Desks keep control over risk and execution.

items.question: Can we pipe alerts into our workflow?
items.answer: Yes. PolyBull delivers to Slack, Teams, Symphony, Bloomberg IB, and custom webhooks.

items.question: What compliance safeguards exist?
items.answer: SOC 2 Type II, regional data residency, SSO, audit trails, and fine-grained permissions ship standard.

cta.title: Ready to see around the next rotation?
cta.subtitle: Join funds that move faster with PolyBull's AI market copilot.
